Label: SESAME 30MHz Riometer Array, Key Parameters - J. Dudeney (British Antarctic Survey)

VariableDescription.Name: Absorption
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Ionospheric Absorption(shifted onto L-shell-aligned coord sys)
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           Riometer Key Parameters, Halley Bay
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     SESAME>Satellite Experiments Simultaneous with Antarctic Measurements
#     DATA_TYPE                       K0>Key Parameters
#     DESCRIPTOR                      RIO>30MHz Riometer Array
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     TEXT                            Equivalent overhead absorption measured 45 degrees to vertical in N,S,E,W
#                                     directions, but in an L-shell-aligned coordinate system (ie rotated 17 degrees
#                                     anti-clockwise from geographic). Preliminary Quiet-Day Curve used.
#                                     1 minute data represent 'spot' values of the 1Hz sampling
#                                     Accurate to 0.05dB, but possible baseline uncertainties of +/-0.5dB
#                                     Ref1: The multiple riometer system at Halley, Antarctica, in
#                                     British Antarctic Survey Bulletin, no 72, p13-23, 1986
#                                     Ref2: Satellite Experiments Simultaneous with Antarctic Measurements (SESAME),
#                                     in GGS Instrument Papers, submitted to Space Science Reviews
#                                     Info:Keith Morrison,GGS Scientist,British Antarctic Survey,Cambridge,CB3 0ET,UK
#                                     E-mail: 19989::MORRISON
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0128
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 SE_K0_RIO_19941228_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  SE_K0_RIO
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      SESAME 30MHz Riometer Array, Key Parameters
#     PI_NAME                         J. Dudeney
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  British Antarctic Survey
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Ground-Based Investigations
#                                     !___ITM Data including Earth Imaging and Ground-Based
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Ground-Based Magnetometers, Riometers, Sounders
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              SESAME_Riometer_Key-Parameters-K0_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time of observation
#  2. Ionospheric Absorption(shifted onto L-shell-aligned coord sys)
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 17:49:04 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
EPOCH                             ION_ABSORP_N           ION_ABSORP_E           ION_ABSORP_S           ION_ABSORP_W
                             (@_Ion Absorp N_)      (@_Ion Absorp E_)      (@_Ion Absorp S_)      (@_Ion Absorp W_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                      dB                     dB                     dB                     dB
